rules_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay life equal to its mana value. If you do, copy it, except the copy isn't legendary. [i](A copy of a permanent spell resolves as a token.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The morning after Talon's desertion, a scrawled note was found pinned to the bounty board. “Cassidy — this war ends tomorrow. Maverick Mesa. High noon. Cordially, your brother Jake.”[/i]
